@MelanieTait one good thing though: my mum had taught me to count to 10 in French. Yay for parents as our first teachers :)
@MelanieTait also the older boys asked what I want to be when I grew up. I said Scientist. They laughed at me and said girls can't do that.
@MelanieTait yep. I started school with a US accent from watching Sesame Street (lived on a farm in middle of nowhere).
